hero.title: Discover Our New Collection
hero.description: Explore our latest furniture collection and discover the perfect pieces for your home.

aboutUs.title: Hi, we're Furniture!
aboutUs.description: Furniro is a new-generation design brand offering a versatile range of top-notch sideboards, poufs, beds, and tables, already delivered to over 10,000 customers across 10 countries. The home of bold ideas and timeless designs, leaving plenty of room for your personality. Already feeling at home?

stats.materialSourced: Materials sourced only from the EU
